meanings.definition: Green pigments found in plants and algae that are essential for photosynthesis.
meanings.sent1: Plants use chlorophylls to capture sunlight for energy.
meanings.sent2: The chlorophylls in the leaves give them their green color.
meanings.sent3: When the chlorophylls throw a party, the sun is always invited!
meanings.sent4: The chlorophylls dance with the sunlight in a vibrant green tango.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, chlorophylls look like tiny green jewels.

meanings.definition: Any of several green pigments found in the chloroplasts of plants and algae.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the different types of chlorophylls in plant cells.
meanings.sent2: The chloroplasts contain chlorophylls that help in photosynthesis.
meanings.sent3: The chlorophylls in the chloroplasts have a secret handshake.
meanings.sent4: In the world of plants, chlorophylls are the superheroes of photosynthesis.
meanings.sent5: The chlorophylls in the chloroplasts are like tiny green factories.
